content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsenytdl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyt-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

-- HEADER_ROW, Row e Field Terminators
    SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyt-data@synapsenytdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]

    -- Tipos e tamanhos dos dados nas colunas
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyt-data@synapsenytdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]'

SELECT
    MAX (LEN(LocationID)) AS len_LocationId,
    MAX (LEN(Borough)) AS len_Borough,
    MAX (LEN(Zone)) AS len_Zone,
    MAX (LEN(service_zone)) AS len_service_zone
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyt-data@synapsenytdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]

-- clausula with - otimizando memória
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyt-data@synapsenytdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )AS [result]

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyt-data@synapsenytdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    ) 
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )AS [result]'

SELECT name, collation_name FROM sys.databases;

-- Especificando UTF-8 Collation no VARCHAR
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyt-data@synapsenytdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
    )AS [result]

CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery;

USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyt-data@synapsenytdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )AS [result]


-- Selecionando apenas subconjuntos
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyt-data@synapsenytdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50)
    )AS [result]    

-- Lendo dados sem cabeçalho
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyt-data@synapsenytdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )    
    WITH (
        Zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) 2
    )
AS [result]    


-- Corrigindo o nome das colunas (localizacao absoluta)
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyt-data@synapsenytdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW = 2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        location_id SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    )AS [result]

-- Criando uma fonte da dados externa
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyt_data
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyt-data@synapsenytdl.dfs.core.windows.net/'
)

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyt_data_raw
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyt-data@synapsenytdl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw'
)

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyt_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW = 2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        location_id SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    )AS [result]


DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyt_data;

SELECT name, location FROM sys.external_data_sources;
